verses.text: Who \add is\add* this that \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w* from \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*, with \w dyed|strong="H2556"\w* \w garments|strong="H0899"\w* from \w Bozrah|strong="H1224"\w*? this \add that is\add* \w glorious|strong="H1921"\w* in his \w apparel|strong="H3830"\w*, \w travelling|strong="H6808"\w* in the \w greatness|strong="H7230"\w* of his \w strength|strong="H3581"\w*? I that \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* in \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*, \w mighty|strong="H7227"\w* to \w save|strong="H3467"\w*.\f + \fr 63.1 \ft glorious: Heb. decked\f*

Wherefore \add art thou\add* \w red|strong="H0122"\w* in thine \w apparel|strong="H3830"\w*, and thy \w garments|strong="H0899"\w* like him that \w treadeth|strong="H1869"\w* in the \w winefat|strong="H1660"\w*?

I have \w trodden|strong="H1869"\w* the \w winepress|strong="H6333"\w* alone; and of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \add there was\add* \w none|strong="H0376"\w* with me: for I will \w tread|strong="H1869"\w* them in mine \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*, and \w trample|strong="H7429"\w* them in my \w fury|strong="H2534"\w*; and their \w blood|strong="H5332"\w* shall be \w sprinkled|strong="H5137"\w* upon my \w garments|strong="H0899"\w*, and I will \w stain|strong="H1351"\w* all my \w raiment|strong="H4403"\w*.

For the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w vengeance|strong="H5359"\w* \add is\add* in mine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, and the \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of my \w redeemed|strong="H1350"\w* is \w come|strong="H0935"\w*.

And I \w looked|strong="H5027"\w*, and \add there was\add* none to \w help|strong="H5826"\w*; and I \w wondered|strong="H8074"\w* that \add there was\add* none to \w uphold|strong="H5564"\w*: therefore mine own \w arm|strong="H2220"\w* brought \w salvation|strong="H3467"\w* unto me; and my \w fury|strong="H2534"\w*, it \w upheld|strong="H5564"\w* me.

And I will tread \w down|strong="H0947"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* in mine \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*, and make them \w drunk|strong="H7937"\w* in my \w fury|strong="H2534"\w*, and I will bring \w down|strong="H3381"\w* their \w strength|strong="H5332"\w* to the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

¶ I will \w mention|strong="H2142"\w* the \w lovingkindnesses|strong="H2617"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \add and\add* the \w praises|strong="H8416"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, according to all that the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w bestowed|strong="H1580"\w* on us, and the \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w goodness|strong="H2898"\w* toward the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, which he hath \w bestowed|strong="H1580"\w* on them according to his \w mercies|strong="H7356"\w*, and according to the \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* of his \w lovingkindnesses|strong="H2617"\w*.

For he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Surely they \add are\add* my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \add that\add* will not \w lie|strong="H8266"\w*: so he was their \w Saviour|strong="H3467"\w*.

In all their \w affliction|strong="H6869"\w* he was \w afflicted|strong="H6862"\w*, and the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* of his \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \w saved|strong="H3467"\w* them: in his \w love|strong="H0160"\w* and in his \w pity|strong="H2551"\w* he \w redeemed|strong="H1350"\w* them; and he \w bare|strong="H5190"\w* them, and \w carried|strong="H5375"\w* them all the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w old|strong="H5769"\w*.

¶ But they \w rebelled|strong="H4784"\w*, and \w vexed|strong="H6087"\w* his \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w*: therefore he was \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* to be their \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*, \add and\add* he \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* against them.

Then he \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w* the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w old|strong="H5769"\w*, \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \add and\add* his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \add saying\add*, Where \add is\add* he that brought them \w up|strong="H5927"\w* out of the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* with the \w shepherd|strong="H7462"\w* of his \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*? where \add is\add* he that \w put|strong="H7760"\w* his \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w within|strong="H7130"\w* him?\f + \fr 63.11 \ft shepherd: or, shepherds\f*

That \w led|strong="H3212"\w* \add them\add* by the right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* with his \w glorious|strong="H8597"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w*, \w dividing|strong="H1234"\w* the \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them, to \w make|strong="H6213"\w* himself an \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*?

That \w led|strong="H3212"\w* them through the \w deep|strong="H8415"\w*, as an \w horse|strong="H5483"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, \add that\add* they should not \w stumble|strong="H3782"\w*?

As a \w beast|strong="H0929"\w* goeth \w down|strong="H3381"\w* into the \w valley|strong="H1237"\w*, the \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* caused him to \w rest|strong="H5117"\w*: so didst thou \w lead|strong="H5090"\w* thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, to \w make|strong="H6213"\w* thyself a \w glorious|strong="H8597"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

¶ Look \w down|strong="H5027"\w* from \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and \w behold|strong="H7200"\w* from the \w habitation|strong="H2073"\w* of thy \w holiness|strong="H6944"\w* and of thy \w glory|strong="H8597"\w*: where \add is\add* thy \w zeal|strong="H7068"\w* and thy \w strength|strong="H1369"\w*, the \w sounding|strong="H1995"\w* of thy \w bowels|strong="H4578"\w* and of thy \w mercies|strong="H7356"\w* toward me? are they \w restrained|strong="H0662"\w*?\f + \fr 63.15 \ft the sounding: or, the multitude\f*

\w Doubtless|strong="H3588"\w* thou \add art\add* our \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, though \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w* be \w ignorant|strong="H3808"\w* of us, and \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w acknowledge|strong="H5234"\w* us not: thou, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add art\add* our \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, our \w redeemer|strong="H1350"\w*; thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add is\add* from \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w*.\f + \fr 63.16 \ft our redeemer…: or, our redeemer from everlasting is thy name\f*

¶ O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, why hast thou made us to \w err|strong="H8582"\w* from thy \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, \add and\add* \w hardened|strong="H7188"\w* our \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* from thy \w fear|strong="H3374"\w*? \w Return|strong="H7725"\w* for thy \w servants’|strong="H5650"\w* sake, the \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* of thine \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*.

The \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of thy \w holiness|strong="H6944"\w* have \w possessed|strong="H3423"\w* \add it\add* but a little \w while|strong="H4705"\w*: our \w adversaries|strong="H6862"\w* have trodden \w down|strong="H0947"\w* thy \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*.

We are \add thine:\add* thou \w never|strong="H5769"\w* barest \w rule|strong="H4910"\w* over them; they were not \w called|strong="H7121"\w* by thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.\f + \fr 63.19 \ft they…: Heb. thy name was not called upon them\f*
